pages.text:
About Us
Home
About Us
We are the Goldmine for musicians
Wheuat Studio is a full service recording studio, owned and operated by Grammy award winning mixer Jay Bien-Aime and Partner Jay Fresh Beatz.
With spacious control room, large booth and a world class blend of analog and digital gear; our A ROOM is the top notch for music artists and live bands. While our B ROOM is the perfect spot for singers, rappers and producers. Not only that, we have our own Media Room for your photoshoots, video shoots, podcast, etc.
We assure you everything you need to grow your career. Our dedicated staff offers recording, production, mixing, mastering, video production, merch printing, work registration and copyright, plus marketing strategies for any project.
Our studio is equipped to handle your project from beginning to end. We have experienced professionals musicians ready to get your songs to radio quality.
Our Mission
To make your recording experience and music needs an easy one by using all resources available to fine tune the abilities of the local artists and musicians.
Our Vision
Is to go beyond standard remit of a sound recording studio and to become a creative hub where artists, bands, songwriters, musicians and producers can realize their sonic potential.
Core Values
The artist is at the center of the process
The past inspires invention and innovation
Experimentation requires artistic rigor
Collaboration activates growth
The Recording Studio
Wheuat Studio is a 1,000 square foot facility with 1 Control Room, 1 Live
Room/Booth, a B Room and a Media Room
Control Room
Wheuat Studio is a state-of-the-art music and post production studio with a large control room and a live tracking room. Equipped with a 6 Professional speakers, Pro Tools HDX, Producer Station, a multitude of new and vintage outboard gear, as well as a 110″ retractable projection screen, 7.1 surround sound, and full HDMI routing capabilities, The Control room is suitable for any session.
Designed and tuned by the owner Jay him self, The control room is great for any type of audio work.
Booth
– Live Room
The live room/booth at Wheuat consists of a large room cater to live tracking, production and writing teams, and is also perfect for sessions that require more of a lounge-type live room.
The two rooms are also swappable, which makes this suite even more flexible. Need a bigger control room to fit your entourage, or need a bigger tracking room for drums, piano, vocals and guitar? Not a problem at Wheuat!
Media Room
The newest addition to Wheuat Studios, is our Media Room perfect for all types of events, photographers, podcasters, music videos etc.
The media room is ready to book! contact us to arrange any event or projects and we’ll accompany all your needs
Our History
Wheuat Studios Together We Show Up From Where It All Started To Where We Are Now
October 2015
Ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
October 2015
voicer recording studio
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists.
May 2016
Ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
May2017
Ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
OCTOBER 2015
ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering,
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
December 2015
Voicer Recording Studio
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists.
March 2015
Ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
March 2017
Ten years of recording, producing, mixing and mastering
Construction of a sister studio, on the Voicer Recording Studio, began in the mid 1990’s attracting major artists from around the globe. Sadly, Hurricane Hugo devastated the island in 1989, and the studio was forced to close.
Want to Record Your Own Hit?
We are a full service studio featuring the latest technology for our all your projects.
1-954-630-5569
Our Team
At Wheuat Studios we believe that the calibre of your engineers & producers
is just as important as the quality of the studio you work in
Jay
Owner
Jay began working as a freelance engineer, with over 20 years in the music industry from building small project studios to major studios. In 2015, he obtained Wheuat Studio and built it from the ground up.
Jay Fresh
Producer/Co-Founder
Jay Fresh Beatz began his musical career at an early age. In 2015 he further pursued his interest in music and started making beats. Fast forward to 2020 he partnered with Wheuat Studios.
Babi Music
Engineer/Manager
Coming from Venezuela, she began as an engineer by doing live sound for studios and recording artists and bands. Through her experience, she’s now known as a music producer and head engineer/manager at Wheuat Studios

Contacts
Home
Contacts
Get in Touch with Us
Wheuat Studio Recording
5000 Hollywood Blvd. Hollywood, FL. 33021
Contact Phone
9546305569
Email: Wheuatmiami@Gmail.com
Working Hours
Mon-Sun: 24 Hours
Did You Know?
We also own a healthy eating restaurant called Lowhaa with free deliveries to the studio. Order what you like and have it delivered during your session.
You can also come do your podcast here. We offer a big booth so any set up is welcome
You can visit the studio to have a chat, discuss your upcoming project, or to direct your session. Please email us at
Wheuatmiami@gmail.com
to make arrangements.
Newsletter
Keep up to date with what's happening at Wheuat Studios.
